channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Framework

item.title: CVE-2018-1270|2024-09-16T19:05:05.139Z -- spring%20by%20pivotal -- spring%20framework
item.description: Spring Framework, versions 5.0 prior to 5.0.5 and versions 4.3 prior to 4.3.15 and older unsupported versions, allow applications to expose STOMP over WebSocket endpoints with a simple, in-memory STOMP broker through the spring-messaging module. A malicious user (or attacker) can craft a message to the broker that can lead to a remote code execution attack.
